description: The LACP laser pistol was based on the V29 laser pistol designed in the early-21st century.  While little more than duct tape and electronics, it runs on a standard UPS.

The V29 laser pistol was designed in the early-21st century and was one of the first firearms to use fusion as its ammunition.  It is larger than most traditional handguns, but displays no recoil whatsoever.
